product.name: Women's Plus Size Tankini Swimsuits Two Piece Bathing Suits for Women Swimwear Tankini Top with Shorts
product.description:
The brightest you on the beach!
FULLFITALL: We are a professional women's fashion swimwear retailer, dedicated to the development, design, supply and sale of women's swimwear.
We provide customers with different styles of swimsuits, such as two-piece swimsuits, tankinis, one-piece swimsuits and plus size swimsuits.
All swimsuits are made of high quality materials and are fashionable and comfortable to wear, making them more attractive.
We strictly use the best quality materials for our swimsuits. The most fashionable styles are used. Make you the most eye-catching person at the beach, pool, spa and other places!
Our swimwear sizes are accurately measured. It will ensure that customers can purchase the best fitting and most comfortable swimsuits.Please choose the size strictly according to the bust and waist data.
Hand washes softly to extended product service life. Hand wash with mild soap. Roll suit in towel & squeeze out excess water,Dry flat.
product.bullet_points:
• 【High quality Material】 The two piece swimsuits for women are made of nylon and spandex, which is soft quick-drying fabric. It's excellent elasticity for perfect fit and durable for long time wearing. Also the top perfectly covers your belly, makes you look slimmer.
• 【Unique Design Padded】 The loose style of two piece bathing suit is suitable for different kinds of breast shapes and cups, offering great support and enhance your curve, brings you closer fitting.
• 【Wide Application】 The two piece bathing suits for women feature both bright color and chic pattern. Swimwear for women is perfect for swimming,beach parties, tropical vacations, summer vacation, honeymoon,hawaii,SPA, swimming and various water activities.
• 【Size Selection】 Please choose the size according to your hip circumference, it is recommended that you choose one size larger swimsuit according to the recommendation of the size chart.
• 【Note】Hand washes softly to extended product service life. Hand wash with mild soap. Roll suit in towel & squeeze out excess water. Dry flat; avoid washers & dryers.
